Name: Dargow IV
Notes: Dargow IV was inspired by the beauties of the landscape, the calmness of the water and the wonderful quality of light at this place, a small village at a lake.
Long Description: Dargow IV is inspired by the deep-felt impression of the landscape, the silence of the lake, and the wonderful light that exists there. It was composed for an ensemble consisting of flute, bass clarinet, French horn, trombone, violoncello, and double bass.
Short Description: Dargow IV was inspired by the beauties of the landscape, the calmness of the water and the wonderful quality of light at this place, a small village at a lake.
